attributes.action: Ban the sale of Homeopathic treatments that have no proven benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Homeopathic drugs contain such miniscule amounts of active ingredients, if any, that they are effectively either plain water, or placebo tablets, and as such it constitutes a fraud to market them as a drug or treatment that will have any positive effect on an ailment.

It is patently absurd to say that water solutions, or a sugar tablet that has no active content, has ‘remembered’ the active content and is therefore effective as a treatment. Therefore these products should not be on public sale or prescribed on the NHS.  

The 'treatments' prescribed by homeopaths have not been the subject of rigorous double blind testing, and are therefore nothing more than a form of mediaeval quackery, with no proof that any of them are more effective than the placebo’s handed out in genuine medical trials.

Homeopathic treatments play on the fears and hopes of the gullible and desperate, and should therefore be declared illegal, as a form of confidence trick.
